attributes.action: Stop the cuts in support staff for vulnerable students.
attributes.background: I am a college student and one to one support is a life saver, it is there to help the students with learning difficulties and to further the help needed for them. Some students can't handle the change in staff and agency staff might not be there on a regular basis and this could make them stressed.

rejection.details: Changes to support staff at your college are the responsibility of the college, not the Government or Parliament. You could raise this issue with the governing body of your college.
